com.bandyer.core_av.capturer.video

Class CapturerVideo

  • AbstractBaseCapturer
    • com.bandyer.core_av.capturer.video.CapturerVideo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VideoInterface<T>

    public class CapturerVideo
extends AbstractBaseCapturer
implements VideoInterface<T>

    Video Capturer from the camera It will follow the activity lifecycle, so you don't need to pause/resume/destroy

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.bandyer.core_av.capturer.video.VideoInterface

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void destroyCapturer() 
      CapturerQuality getBestCaptureFormat(android.content.Context context, CameraVideoFeeder feeder)
      Method to request the best capture format that your device camera can support related to our supported aspect-ratio. You may want to render with a higher quality then our default (we don't recommend it)

      Used to indicate the current camera feeder

        public boolean isVideoEnabled()

      • setMaxVideoOutputQuality

        public CapturerVideo setMaxVideoOutputQuality(CapturerQuality outputQualityCapturer)

        Set the max video output quality to be streamed Be aware that this is the max output that will be streamed and not the actual value that will be received by the other parts

      • getBestCaptureFormat

        public CapturerQuality getBestCaptureFormat(android.content.Context context,
                                            CameraVideoFeeder feeder)

        Method to request the best capture format that your device camera can support related to our supported aspect-ratio. You may want to render with a higher quality then our default (we don't recommend it)

        Parameters:
        context - Context
        feeder - The feeder for which to request the best capturing supported quality
        Returns:
        the best capturing quality supported for the feeder
